article_metadata.author: MICHAEL ROKNICK | Herald Business Editor

og.description: NEW CASTLE – New Castle-based Jameson Health System said Monday it reached a tentative deal to merge into the UPMC network.
og.title: Jameson reaches deal with UPMC
